summary: Adds many new conjuration spell for all users!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/33jlm9z.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]Featured on [url={http://www/gametillinsane.com/}]GameTillInsane.com[/url]
[img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/16a74hj.jpg[/img][/center]

-Update (2.0)-
Adds the following spells:
-Dwarven Sphere
-Snow Bear
-Giant Spider
-Hagraven
ATTENTION!: Moves Spell Tomes to the table when entering Belethor\'s General Goods!

This mod adds new conjuration mods such as the ones below:
-Giant
-Spriggan
-Dwarven Centurion
-Frost Troll
-Ancient Dragon

NOTICE!: Spell books are located up the stairs next to the bed in Belethor\'s General Goods located in Whiterun!

COMING SOON!:
-Black Bear
-Horker
-Drauger
-Dwarven Spider
-Falmer
-Horse
-Ice Wraith
-Mud Crab
-Werewolf
-Wisp

-Installation-
Mods can be simply downloaded using NMM

OR

Drag the file into your Skyrim data folder located through Steam-Steam Apps-Common-Skyrim

Created by Yankster
author: Yankster
